description: Get the pipes associated with this account. For more information about pipes, see Amazon EventBridge Pipes in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide.

nested_items.name: Pipes
nested_items.description: The pipes returned by the call.

nested_items.name: DesiredState
nested_items.description: The state the pipe should be in.

nested_items.name: CurrentState
nested_items.description: The state the pipe is in.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason the pipe is in its current state.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the pipe was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the pipe was last updated, in ISO-8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD).

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The ARN of the source resource.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The ARN of the target resource.

nested_items.name: Enrichment
nested_items.description: The ARN of the enrichment resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.
